name: Mizo Keyboard LITE
description: He keyboard in a tum ber chu English QWERTY keyboard nena thlk tawn (switch) ngai lova Mizo hawrawp   chhut tel theih a ni. Hei bkah hian Indian Rupee Sign thar (  ) leh hlui (  ) dah a ni bawk. He keyboard hi package t thei ang ber tura duan anih avangin settings chi hrang hrang auto-suggestion/prediction, voice input, user dictionary te a awm ve lo.  Note: Key engpawh kha hmet reng (longpress) la, option a neih chuan a lo lang mai ang. Entirnan, Enter key hmeh reng chuan smiley a lo lang ang.
